cast.overview: 70-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.
cast.title: The Intern

details.biography: Anders Holm (born May 29, 1981) is an American actor and writer, known for the TV series Workaholics (2011), as well as the films Game Over, Man! (2018) and The Intern (2015). He has been married to Emma Nesper Holm since September 2011, and they have one child.
details.name: Anders Holm
